SELECT ROWNUM RN, T1.LIC_GRP_ID, T1.PRJ_ID, T1.AUTH_GRP_ID, T1.USR_ID, T1.USR_NM, T1.EMAIL, T1.TELNO, T1.USR_IMG_ID, T1.DEPT_ID, T1.DEPT_NAME, T1.USR_POSITION_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', T1.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM, T1.USR_DUTY_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', T1.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM FROM ( SELECT B.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.AUTH_GRP_ID, A.USR_ID, B.USR_NM, B.EMAIL, B.TELNO, B.USR_IMG_ID, B.DEPT_ID, SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, B.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME, B.USR_POSITION_CD, B.USR_DUTY_CD FROM PRJ2001 A INNER JOIN STM3000 B ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = B.USR_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND B.DEL_CD = '02' AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND B.BLOCK = '01'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY B.USR_NM, B.USR_POSITION_CD DESC, B.USR_DUTY_CD DESC
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.USR_POSITION_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.USR_DUTY_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.USR_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'

SELECT ROWNUM RN, T1.LIC_GRP_ID, T1.USR_ID, T1.USR_NM, T1.EMAIL, T1.TELNO, T1.USR_IMG_ID, T1.DEPT_ID, T1.DEPT_NAME, T1.USR_POSITION_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00007', T1.USR_POSITION_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_POSITION_NM, T1.USR_DUTY_CD, NVL(SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00008', T1.USR_DUTY_CD, '1'), '-') AS USR_DUTY_NM FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.USR_ID, A.USR_NM, A.EMAIL, A.TELNO, A.USR_IMG_ID, A.DEPT_ID, SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME, A.USR_POSITION_CD, A.USR_DUTY_CD FROM STM3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.BLOCK = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT Z.USR_ID FROM PRJ2001 Z WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = Z.USR_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# )
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.USR_NM
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.USR_POSITION_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.USR_DUTY_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.USR_ID = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
